titles: VVits theater of the little world
author: Albott, Robert, fl. 1600.
Bodenham, John, fl. 1600.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for N[icholas] L[ing] & are to be sold at the vvest doore of Paules,
notes: Third number in a series sponsored by John Bodenham, to whom this work is dedicated and sometimes attributed.
Running title reads: The theater of the little world.
In this variant the dedication is signed: Robert Allott.
Identified as STC 382 on UMI microfilm reel 733.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
